about_the_game:
Complete vegetation control train. SW1500, Tool Car, Crew/Dorm, Chemical Cars, Scripted Weed Control Car with animated spraying arms that you can control.

The sprayer car is scripted and animated. There is a control panel that will appear when you right click on that car. You can turn sprayers on or off and select which ones to spray with. You can also adjust the spray arms via an animated slider allowing you to move them to avoid trackside objects.

Features include:

Full Custom Cab
Auto Running Numbers
Scripted Weed Control Car
Animated Spraying Arms
